ControlType.DataSourceTypeName: select dept_code,dept_name,DEPT_ENAME,SPELL_CODE,WB_CODE from com_department where regdept_flag = '1' and dept_code in (5071,5109) ORDER BY dept_code

QueryDataSource.Name: dtSource
QueryDataSource.Sql: select decode(grouping_id(t.doct_code,t.card_no, t2.name,t.item_name,t.package_name,t.specs,t.qty,t.reg_dpcd,t.oper_date,t.fee_cpcd, t.fee_date),0,t.card_no,'合计:') 门诊号, decode(grouping_id(t.doct_code,t.card_no, t2.name,t.item_name,t.package_name,t.specs,t.qty,t.reg_dpcd,t.oper_date,t.fee_cpcd, t.fee_date),0,t2.name,'/') 姓名, decode(grouping_id(t.doct_code,t.card_no, t2.name,t.item_name,t.package_name,t.specs,t.qty,t.reg_dpcd,t.oper_date,t.fee_cpcd, t.fee_date),0, case when nvl(length(t.package_name),0)> 0 then '['||t.package_name||']'||t.item_name else t.item_name end,'/') 项目, decode(grouping_id(t.doct_code,t.card_no, t2.name,t.item_name,t.package_name,t.specs,t.qty,t.reg_dpcd,t.oper_date,t.fee_cpcd, t.fee_date),0,t.specs,'/') 规格, decode(grouping_id(t.doct_code,t.card_no, t2.name,t.item_name,t.package_name,t.specs,t.qty,t.reg_dpcd,t.oper_date,t.fee_cpcd, t.fee_date),0,to_char(t.qty,'999.99'),'/') 数量, sum(nvl(t.own_cost,0) - nvl(t.eco_cost,0) - nvl(t.donate_cost,0)) 实收金额, decode(grouping_id(t.doct_code,t.card_no, t2.name,t.item_name,t.package_name,t.specs,t.qty,t.reg_dpcd,t.oper_date,t.fee_cpcd, t.fee_date),0, fun_get_dept_name(t.reg_dpcd),'/') 开单科室, fun_get_employee_name(t.doct_code) 开单人, decode(grouping_id(t.doct_code,t.card_no, t2.name,t.item_name,t.package_name,t.specs,t.qty,t.reg_dpcd,t.oper_date,t.fee_cpcd, t.fee_date),0,to_char(t.oper_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'/') 开嘱时间, decode(grouping_id(t.doct_code,t.card_no, t2.name,t.item_name,t.package_name,t.specs,t.qty,t.reg_dpcd,t.oper_date,t.fee_cpcd, t.fee_date),0,fun_get_employee_name(t.fee_cpcd),'/') 收费员, decode(grouping_id(t.doct_code,t.card_no, t2.name,t.item_name,t.package_name,t.specs,t.qty,t.reg_dpcd,t.oper_date,t.fee_cpcd, t.fee_date),0,to_char(t.fee_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'/') 结账时间 from fin_opb_feedetail t left join com_patientinfo t2 on t.card_no = t2.card_no where (t.reg_dpcd = '&cmbDept' or 'ALL' = '&cmbDept') and t.reg_dpcd in (5071,5109) and t.oper_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date('&dtEndTime', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and t.pay_flag = '1' group by rollup(t.doct_code,(t.card_no, t2.name,t.item_name,t.package_name,t.specs,t.qty,t.reg_dpcd,t.oper_date,t.fee_cpcd, t.fee_date))

ReportQueryInfo.QueryFilePath: Report\医美\医美门诊开单项目明细统计设置.xml
